item.title: EP 16 - If I Meet A Lame Alien . . .
item.itunes:title: If I Meet A Lame Alien . . .
item.description:
Today we talk about time warps, the coming civil war, and spooooooooky ghosts!

Unfortunately today, a man named Jarrod Ramos went crazy and shot up a newspaper. Why? Because he was mad at them for writing an article about him. Please, people, please if you are having thoughts of harming yourself or others talk to someone! 

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org helps with anger issues too. Please, just think things through.

Let’s move on to Las Vegas, that tiny little town in the desert where Joshua Warren claims to have found a time warp. Actually, it’s not nearly as cool at it would seem. Where’s all the dinosaurs?

Then we take on the topic of the Second American Civil war. Is it really coming? “The View” seems to think so! So do 31% of Americans. Do you? Are you prepared? Well, don’t put on your war paint just yet. 

And finally, we go to Illinois and learn the history of Hickory Hill and the slave ghosts that still haunt the property. Would you be able to spend the night in the spoooooky house? The first man who tried to stay the night in the haunted attic ran out of the house and died only a few hours later. A reported 200 people tried to stay the night at Hickory Hill but they were all run out one by one by chilling voices and phantoms hands. Only one man, a journalist named David Rodgers stayed the whole night, back in 1978, and since then the house has been under 24 hour guard. Why? Listen to the podcast and find out!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

Paranormal Investigator Claims To Find 'Time Warp' Near Las Vegas

Hickory Hill: The Haunted Slave House In The North

And, one of my favorite books of all time:

Haunted Places: The National Directory: Ghostly Abodes, Sacred Sites, UFO Landings and Other Supernatural Locations

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
